text:
<https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/tree/master/sdk/node#chaincode-deployment-directory-structure> here there is no mention of having to run `npm install` but otherwise I can't see how it would work
```
vagrant@hyperledger-devenv:v0.0.10-d2dcc1b:/opt/gopath/src/github.com/hyperledger/fabric/sdk/node$ node test/unit/chain-tests.js | node_modules/.bin/tap-spec
-bash: node_modules/.bin/tap-spec: No such file or directory
module.js:338
    throw err;
          ^
Error: Cannot find module 'debug'
```
